author: tbenr
content:
It doesn't simplify that much the scenario I have in mind, which is: As CL I want to print out block rewards and recipient address without assuming configurations\registrations are perfectly in sync among VC\BN\BuilderInfra.
To summarize, what I see is:
Local EL:
- trivial to get feeRecipient (directly from payload)
- non-trivial to get the rewards (not directly exposed via engine api yet)
Builder:
- non-trivial to get feeRecipient (may be the feeRecipient from payloadHeader or may be in last TX of unblinded payload)
- trivial to get the rewards (explicitly given in the Bid, assuming builder trust)

author: ralexstokes
content: my mental model is that proposers have distributed their latest registration well ahead of any proposal and kind of think it would be papering over a relay/builder bug if we don't just assume they have the correct information
